title: Satisfied!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>You, look!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eh, what is it? ....Ooh, where’s that uniform from!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>It’s from Hong Kong. Lanzhu knows you like uniforms, You.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eeeh, how do you know? Did someone tell you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>No, Lanzhu saw it in a school idol magazine. You do like them, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I love them! This is my first time seeing a Hong Kong uniform, though~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Do you want to try it on?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hmm.... I much rather see you in it, Lanzhu-chan! So, can you try it!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaaah! You want to see me, huh! Sure, Lanzhu will wear it as much as you want! Behold my uniformed self!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Uniforms.... are really nice, aren’t they~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
